ets ready to speak.

  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:53 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages=



  : : Diesel : :

  The dark tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, =
drops down infront of their convoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a=
 stop.

  Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
    ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent=
: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    =
                                           : : Sting : :

                 =
       A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending from the sky, up=
 ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Deemos.  He waits =
to see if they will see him and stop...
      ----- Original Message ----- =

      From: RoboRick007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tue=
sday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      :=
 : Diesel : :

      Diesel pulls out, following the others towards their d=
estination.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Hollywood N=
arrator 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, August =
13, 2002 9:47 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        Arrow trans=
forms into a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the d=
estination. Deems transforms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behi=
nd...

          ----- Original Message -----
          From: RoboRick007
 =
         To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
          Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 200=
2 2:29 PM
          Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          : : Diesel : :=


          He smiled at his friends excitment.

          Diesel: Alright =
lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing=
 it!

          Diesel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

          Diese=
l: Roll out!

          He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arr=
ow to lead the way.
